name: Jack Rope's Fighting VR - Prototype
description:
Are you ready to challenge the your inner Demons in this rhythm based exercise. This is a new way to stay fit with your Oculus Quest in VR!

Here are some impression’s of the game.

How to Play:

  • Flow based gameplay
  • Beat the demons by punching the targets and throw it back on the demon.
  • More strike power results in more Demon Damage
  • Beat the demon before the music ends
  • Avoid Fire  by moving your body
  • keep to stay in streak

Features in Prototype

  • one normal and one hard demons
  • 3 types of targets
  • 2 types of fire obstacles 
  • score and combo display
  • power calculation

I'm thrilled for your  feedback, develop@gogolith.de
Thanks for the support. 

Updates soon...
